return.description:
Returns 1 on success or 0 on failure.For unsuccessful parses, error information can be retrieved with
   xml_get_error_code,
   xml_error_string,
   xml_get_current_line_number,
   xml_get_current_column_number and
   xml_get_current_byte_index.Entity errors are reported at the end of the data thus only if
    is_final is set and TRUE.
